content.rendered:
Rapyder

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Rapyder, a born in cloud company, was established in 2016 with a clear objective – to make cloud work for you. As a pioneer in the field, Rapyder Cloud Solutions has seen exponential growth year after year, evolving as a strategic and leading cloud consulting partner. Our journey has been focused on delivering optimal technology solutions that reduces costs, streamlines business processes, and provides significant business advantages.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Web UI/UX
  • Web Development
  • Shopify Marketplace
  • Landing Pages

INDUSTRY

Cloud Computing

CHALLENGES

Simplifying Cloud with Expert Solutions

01

Balancing Technical Information with User-Friendly Design

02

Creating a suitable brand identity for the project

03

Maintaining a consistent visual identity and user experience across various platforms

04

Designing a functional yet aesthetic experience for users

SOLUTION

Consistency and Transparency in Communication

We designed a visual identity that positioned Rapyder as market leaders accompanied with a highly efficient user interface. An allusion to cloud technology is subtly integrated into the letter “E”, where the negative space forms a cloud shape. Overall, the design encapsulates the essence of Rapyder’s swift and efficient service, ensuring both accuracy and innovation in its delivery.

Rapid Ideas for Growing Brands

IDENTITY

The logo for Rapyder was crafted with a focus on conveying the rapidity of its service. The icon mirrors the fletching found at the rear of an arrow, symbolizing stability and precision during flight. The cube at the end represents the completion provided by Rapyder’s solutions. Additionally, the upward movement of the two arrows signifies growth.

ICONOGRAPHY

Aesthetics Designed To Match an
Unmatched Vision

UI/UX

A seamless web experience to position Rapyder as the Market leaders they are.

IMPACT

Cloud Simplified, Excellence Amplified

Rapyder’s innovative visual identity and intuitive UI/UX design have significantly enhanced their market presence, establishing them as a distinct leader in cloud consulting. The seamless integration of technical prowess with user-friendly design has boosted customer engagement and trust. Highlighting their achievements and expertise effectively, the design ensures a consistent and memorable brand experience across all platforms.
